title: Friendship in a biscuit tin
creator_credit: Vivianne Everett, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Vivianne Everett pays homage to her friend Vikki who has taught her awareness and acceptance, while celebrating a life long friendship that has stood the test of time. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Arts Victoria and the Community Support Fund.
creator_credit_for_label: Vivianne Everett, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
